article.title: Apptis to Deliver Information Technology Solutions and Services for DISA Contract
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Apptis Incorporated will participate in the $12.225 billion ENCORE II Information Technology Solutions contract awarded by the Defense Information Technology Contracting Organization under the Defense Information Systems Agency (DISA). As a subcontractor to NETCONN Solutions, Apptis provides information technology solutions and services for the U.S. military, the U.S. Defense Department and other federal government agencies.
